official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of a water supply delivery system for the city of Yuma, Ariz.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of a water supply delivery system for the city of Yuma, Arizona.
